attributes.action: Call for 17 MPs to vote as instructed by their constituents over BREXIT
attributes.additional_details:
These MPs represent REMAIN constituencies and voted:

- LEAVE in the referendum

NO to: 
- second referendum
- delay BREXIT
- indicative votes
- Norway +
- Customs Union
- revoking Article 50 to prevent no-deal
- power for MPs to block no-deal
- confirmatory referendum on any deal

YES to: 
- no-deal BREXIT

These MPs are clearly governed by their own self interest and are not representing the will of their constituencies. They MUST change position to reflect the will of those they represent.
attributes.background:
Tory MPs betray their constituents.

Steve Baker
Bob Blackman
Crispin Blunt
Geoff Clifton-Brown

Ross Thomson

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for individual MPs, not the UK Parliament and Government.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236800
